title: Pool of Lies
description: Dr. Ava Carmichael is a successful heart surgeon with a loving wife. Unbeknownst to her wife, Ava takes on a second job in order to break up the monotony that her life has fallen into. It's while working this second job that she meets Kacey Hudson, a dark, mysterious woman who ignites a spark inside Ava. A spark that inevitably leads to more lies and send's Ava's life into a tailspin.  Will Ava be able to regain control of her life or will she drown in the lies that she's told?
author: D.J.  Small
